Uses of Interface
fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces.ReplicaI

  • Packages that use ReplicaI 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components  
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.connection  
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components  
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces  
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.ports  

    • Uses of ReplicaI in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.components that implement ReplicaI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReplicationManager<T>
      The class ReplicationManager implements a generic component to represent several replication patterns in a distributed application: dispatchers, fault-tolerant or error-tolerant, etc. replication.
      class  ReplicationManagerNonBlocking<T>
      The class ReplicationManagerNonBlocking introduces the possibility to call many replicas but returning the first result while letting the other (repeated) computations terminating (not possible with invokeAny, an important behaviour when using replication for fault-tolerance.
      class  StateBasedDispatcher<T>
      The class StateBasedDispatcher implements a request dispatcher that selects for each request the server which has the shortest waiting queue.

    • Uses of ReplicaI in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.connection

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.connection that implement ReplicaI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReplicableConnector<T>
      The class ReplicableConnector implements a connector for the ReplicableCI component interface.
      class  ReplicableInboundPort<T>
      The class ReplicableInboundPort implements an inbound port for the ReplicableCI component interface.
      class  ReplicableInboundPortForThreadPool<T>
      The class ReplicableInboundPortForThreadPool implements an inbound port for the ReplicableCI<T> component interface that make the requests be handled by a specific pool of threads in the owner component.
      class  ReplicableOutboundPort<T>
      The class ReplicableOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the ReplicableCI component interface.

    • Uses of ReplicaI in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components that implement ReplicaI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstantServer
      The class ConstantServer implements a server component that returns a constant result for any given parameter.
      class  MonitoredServer
      The class MonitoredServer implements a request server that monitors its request queue size and notify a dispatcher that selects servers to dispatch them request depending on their queue sizes.
      class  RandomServer
      The class RandomServer implements a server component that returns a random result for any given parameter.
      class  Server
      The class Server implements a server component that returns a customized result for any given parameter.

    • Uses of ReplicaI in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of ReplicaI in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ReplicableCI<T>
      The component interface ReplicableCI declares the signature of the service that will be proposed as replicated service.

    • Uses of ReplicaI in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.ports

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.ports that implement ReplicaI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReplicableInboundPortNonBlocking<T>
      The class ReplicableInboundPortNonBlocking implements an inbound port for the ReplicableCI component interface, making the the call method of the component executed by the thread of the caller component.
